titles.title: On Calvary’s brow my Savior died

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: On Calvary’s brow my Savior died ’Twas there my Lord was crucified; ’Twas on the cross He bled for me, And purchased there my pardon free.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: O Calvary! dark Calvary! Where Jesus shed His blood for me; O Calvary! blest Calvary! ’Twas there my Savior died for me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: ’Mid rending rocks and darkening skies My Savior bows His head and dies; The opening veil reveals the way To life divine and endless day.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O Jesus, Lord, how can it be That Thou shouldst give Thy life for me, To bear the cross and agony In that dread hour on Calvary!
